info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 10:22PM CDT until June 24 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS...SOUTH CENTRAL PIKE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS AND NORTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pike, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Pleasant Hill and Clarksville around 1030 PM CDT. Belleview around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hamburg, Mozier, Beecreek, and Nebo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
